curl:
https://curl.se/download/curl-7.80.0.tar.gz

openssl:
https://www.openssl.org/source/old/1.1.1/openssl-1.1.1k.tar.gz

valgrind:
https://sourceware.org/ftp/valgrind/valgrind-3.15.0.tar.bz2

iperf:
https://jaist.dl.sourceforge.net/project/iperf2/iperf-2.1.4.tar.gz

unqlite:
git clone https://github.com/symisc/unqlite.git

log-rxi : https://github.com/rxi/log.c.git
